translations: 拱（拱顶）的高度大于起拱线长度的一半的

sentences.sentence: She was well aware of the difficulties that had to be surmounted.
sentences.translation: 她很清楚必须克服哪些困难。
胡克的天才又一次战胜了困难。

sentences.sentence: Yet the complexities that confront those who would study such materials are not wholly different from those recently surmounted by historians of criminal law in England during the same period.
sentences.translation: 然而，研究这类材料的人所面临的复杂性，与英国刑法史学家最近在同一时期所克服的复杂性并没有完全不同。
